name: Add your Thanks.io recipient from a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time you add a row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a recipient to a Thanks.io mailing list. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13Q9-mFjgGxd-eaX4DXta87RwYfY6nt2dJPBxuELvJBA/edit?usp=sharing).
